thread.title: Ground News - Gracie Abrams makes music that unites strangers — and has Taylor Swift calling
thread.title_full: Ground News - Gracie Abrams makes music that unites strangers — and has Taylor Swift calling

author: Toronto Sun
title: Ground News - Gracie Abrams makes music that unites strangers — and has Taylor Swift calling
text:
Summary by Toronto Sun The year 2023 was good to Gracie Abrams. She released her debut album. She opened for Taylor Swift . She sold out a U.S. tour, and took that tour to Europe. She started writing new music. And to cap it all off, she got her first Grammy nomination: best new artist. Share menu More
